oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: George M. Clark correspondence with Zella Armstrong, Robert Sparks Walker, and James L. Fowle, 1944 November 24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Clark, George M.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from George M. Clark with Zella Armstrong, Robert Sparks Walker, and James L. Fowle informing them of J. B. Pound's donation to the Brainerd Mission Foundation and then discussing the next steps in the project, and how much money they need to raise to preserve the cemetery.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cherokee Indians -- Missions; Historic preservation
Brainerd Mission
